languages.text: {n}Медленно, очень медленно Ирлиэт шагает навстречу ощетинившемуся клинками Маражаю — и тот остается неподвижен. Вы неторопливо следуете за ней — кажется, речь рейнджера заворожила друкари, и тот не торопится нападать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Медленно, очень медленно Ирлиэт шагает навстречу ощетинившимися клинками Маражаю — и тот остается неподвижен. Вы нетопопливо следуете за ней — кажется, речь рейнджера заворожила друкари, и тот не торопится нападать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Медленно, очень медленно Ирлиэт шагает навстречу ощетинившемуся клинками Маражаю — и тот остается неподвижен. Вы неторопливо следуете за ней — кажется, речь рейнджера заворожила друкари, и тот не торопится нападать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristled blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

{n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}
{n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}
{n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lentement, très lentement, Yrliet s'approche de Marazhai et de ses lames menaçantes. Ce dernier reste immobile, comme subjugué par ses paroles. Vous la suivez prudemment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lentement, très lentement, Yrliet s'approche de Marazhai et de ses lames menaçantes. Ce dernier reste immobile, comme subjugué par ses paroles. Vous la suivez prudemment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ゆっくりと、実にゆっくりと、ユリエットはマラズハイと彼の刃に向かって進む。マラズハイは、まるで彼女の言葉に魅了されたかのようにぴくりとも動かない。あなたは注意深く彼女の後を追う。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ゆっくりと、実にゆっくりと、ユリエットはマラズハイと彼の刃に向かって進む。マラズハイは、まるで彼女の言葉に魅了されたかのようにぴくりとも動かない。あなたは注意深く彼女の後を追う。{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特以非常缓慢的速度，朝玛拉斋与他手中的利刃前进。玛拉斋一动不动，似乎迷失在了伊莉耶特的话语中。你小心翼翼地跟在伊莉耶特身后。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特以非常缓慢的速度，朝玛拉斋与他手中的利刃前进。玛拉斋一动不动，似乎迷失在了伊莉耶特的话语中。你小心翼翼地跟在伊莉耶特身后。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Langsam, sehr langsam, geht Yrliet auf Marazhai und seine zornigen Klingen zu — und er bleibt reglos, offenbar von ihren Worten verzaubert. Du folgst ihr vorsichtig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Langsam, sehr langsam, geht Yrliet auf Marazhai und seine zornigen Klingen zu — und er bleibt reglos, offenbar von ihren Worten verzaubert. Du folgst ihr vorsichtig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Despacio, muy despacio, Yrliet avanza hacia Marazhai y sus relucientes espadas; y el Drukhari permanece inmóvil, aparentemente encandilado por sus palabras. La sigues con cautela.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Despacio, muy despacio, Yrliet avanza hacia Marazhai y sus relucientes espadas; y el Drukhari permanece inmóvil, aparentemente encandilado por sus palabras. La sigues con cautela.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, yavaşça ama çok yavaşça Marazhai'a ve hazırda bekleyen kılıçlarına doğru ilerliyor. Marazhai, sözlerinden büyülenmiş gibi hareketsiz duruyor. Yrliet'i dikkatle takip ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Slowly, very slowly, Yrliet advances toward Marazhai and his bristling blades — and he remains still, seemingly entranced by her words. You carefully follow her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet yavaşça, çok yavaşça Marazhai'a ve onun saldırmaya hazır kılıçlarına doğru ilerliyor. Marazhai, sözlerinden büyülenmiş gibi hareketsiz duruyor. Yrliet'i dikkatle takip ediyorsun.{/n}
